welcome_message_body: Welcome to Turgutlu, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Aşçı Yusuf Et Lokantası
restaurants.description: Aşçı Yusuf Et Lokantası is a steakhouse located in Turgutlu.
restaurants.address: Turan Mh. Keçeciler Sk. (Keçeciler Sokak), 45400 Turgutlu

restaurants.description: Giritli Meyhanesi is a meyhane located in the city.
